title: This is working
creator_credit: Film Australia, National Aboriginal Employment Development Committee, Elisabeth Knight and Keith Gow
brief_description: Aboriginal people suffer an unemployment rate six times higher than the white community. Shows Aboriginal people in New South Wales who are working on four different job creation projects. Features, amongst others, Bill Powell, Aboriginal Liaison Officer TAFE, Rose Kirby, Murrin Bridge Handcraft Industries, Des Simon, apprentice carpenter, Purfleet and Dallas Carberry, park management trainee, Orient Point.
